1.01.name: wordpress/boozurk
1.01.description: Clear theme with a lot of features. Boozurk supports the latest WP innovations like custom menus, post formats and featured images. It has 2 sidebars, up to 7 widget areas, a ton of new widgets, a new default avatar, cool tooltips, some useful javascript features, mobile support (with a touchscreen-friendly dedicated style) and many customization options! WP3.4 compatible
